title: Client crash
body: I'm not sure where to post this but my client has crashed a few times during champ select causing me to lose 4 lp and giving me a que wait time. Is that something riot can fix or is it just going to keep happening?

replies.body:
This is something we can work together to fix, as it's likely caused by an *unstable connection* to our matchmaking servers. I'd strongly recommend working through the steps within our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as they will take you through configuring your network settings to be the most compatible with League.

Hit me up if you continue to experience crashes in champ select again.
